TopicTitle: What is your preferred way of capturing? Part 2

Articles.Content:
Here is Part 2 of what is your preferred way of capturing? This one has Jool, Laythe and a place to add up your entries and pick your top one ( eg. Someone said thrust braking 3 times, aero once and using a moon once, they would put in aero as they said that the most amount of times).

At Jool I would use Tylo as it is safe and uses little fuel. 

At Laythe I would propulsively capture.

What about you?

(The reason that this isn't one big thread is that I have a maximum of 3 questions a poll)

Part 1 with Eve, Kerbin and Duna is here:
